Late summer sketch

# BITSY VERSION 5.1

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

DLG SPR_3
POS 2 6,11

ITM 0
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
11111111
00000000
00000000
00000000
DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
Is it time to go?

DLG SPR_0
"""
{sequence
  - This is as far as we can go today
  - What a long, hot summer
  - Remember that day we lay on the floor and did nothing?
  - You can see the mountains from here
  - Does that cloud look like a toaster to you?
  - ...
    Yeah, me neither
  - {wvy}.....{wvy}
  - {wvy}........{wvy}
  - I wonder how long we can make this moment last
}
"""

DLG SPR_1
We left our bicycles by the side of the road

DLG SPR_2
They've gone on ahead

DLG SPR_3
Hey pal, let's sit for a bit!

END 0
And so we rode home...

VAR a
42
